items.title_neutral: Lorentzian Logic: Solving Unknown Cluster Numbers via Differentiable Graph Entropy
items.excerpt: Optimize network analysis with LSEnet, a deep learning model that eliminates the need to predefined cluster numbers. items.title_neutral: LSEnet: Mastering Automated Data Grouping in Curved Hyperbolic Space
